participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Reflective and sometimes critical, but values companionship and shared experiences.
participant_1.background: I put on my favorite Charlie Daniels song and cuddle with my dog. I have a black belt in karate. If I'm not drinking, I'm thinking, which makes me uncomfortable. My children are a disappointment. I got married last year.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and social, loves exploring and trying new things with friends.
participant_2.background: I do not wish to disclose my marital status. I like football. I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely. I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries. My favorite subject in school was science.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm excited to spend my day trying new things.
That sounds fun! What are you planning on doing?
I'm not sure yet! I'm open to suggestions.
Well, I'm not really sure what you're interested in. I know I like to go to football games.
Oh! I love football! I'm a huge fan of the Rams.
That's cool! I'm a fan of the Eagles.
Oh, that's too bad. We'll have to root for different teams.
That's okay! We can still be friends.
Of course! I'm always looking for new friends.
Me too! So, what else do you like to do?
I like to go to the movies, read books, and play video games.
That's cool! I like to do all of those things too.
Oh, well then we have a lot in common!
I think so! We should hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'll bring the snacks.
Sounds good! I'll bring the drinks.
